Offices Send a Release Client Login Resources Blog Journalists RSS Boca Woods Country Club's Director of Operations Receives Prestigious Professional Designation News provided by Boca Woods Country Club Apr 28, 2025, 07:55 ET Share this article Share to X Share this article Share to X BOCA RATON, Fla. , April 25, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Kyle Hillhouse , CCM, Director of Operations of the Boca Woods Country Club in Boca Raton, Florida , has been awarded with the Certified Club Manager (CCM) designation by the Club Management Association of America (CMAA). The CCM designation indicates that a club management professional has completed a rigorous course of study and training and shows a dedication to proficiency and expertise in club management. Approximately 1,500 CMAA members hold this prestigious designation. Director of Operations Kyle Hillhouse pictured with General Manager David Sweet during a club celebration. "Two thumbs up for Easter! Director of Operations Kyle Hillhouse brings the holiday spirit as the Easter Bunny, ready for takeoff at the Club's festive helicopter arrival." "Director of Operations Kyle Hillhouse provides exceptional service with a smile, engaging with members during an elegant dinner event." Boca Woods Country Club's Director of Operations Receives Prestigious Professional Designation Post this Established in 1965, the CCM designation is the hallmark of professionalism in club management. It is a valuable, internationally recognized, and widely-respected mark of an individual's long-term commitment to professional development and the club industry. In order to receive the CCM designation, one must invest time in specified educational requirements through the Business Management Institutes, attend the World Conference on Club Management, and maintain activity within their local chapter. After these conditions have been met, the individual must pass the CCM Exam. Kyle was approved by the Certification Committee of CMAA after successfully passing an extensive certification examination on club operations. He/she joins more than 1,500 club managers worldwide who have attained this hallmark of professionalism in club management.  Through the Certified Club Manager designation, CMAA encourages the education and advancement of its members and assists club officers and members in securing the most efficient and successful club operations available. About Boca Woods Country Club Boca Woods Country Club is an established Residential Equity Club located in Boca Raton , Florida.  Since 1986 Boca Woods has provided residents with lifestyle amenities that have grown to include two championship golf courses, seven har-tru tennis courts, four pickleball courts with lights for night play, an expansive practice facility including a lighted putting green, 10,000 square feet of state-of-the-art fitness facilities, fully-functioning ai-driven zoom rooms for meetings and multiple dining venues.  The Club is more than its amenities:  it is a Community of people who care for each other and share common interests. Boca Woods is committed to continuous growth and improvement, exemplified by Club's investment in continuing education at all levels within the Organization.  All-team educational events over the years have featured keynote speakers such as Kelly Merbler , Andy Stangenberg , John DiJulius , Corey Saban and others – helping the team unify their efforts toward creating wonderful Member experiences and strengthening connection with the shared values represented through CHARACTER.  For more information follow Boca Woods on LinkedIn, Facebook and Instagram. About CMAA Founded in 1927, the Club Management Association of America (CMAA) is the largest professional association for managers of membership clubs with 6,800 members throughout the US and internationally. Our members contribute to the success of more than 2,500 country, golf, athletic, city, faculty, military, town, and yacht clubs. The objectives of the Association are to promote relationships between club management professionals and other similar professions; to encourage the education and advancement of members; and to provide the resources needed for efficient and successful club operations. Under the covenants of professionalism, education, leadership, and community, CMAA continues to extend its reach as the leader in the club management practice. CMAA is headquartered in Alexandria, VA , with 42 professional chapters and more than 40 student chapters and colonies. Learn more at cmaa.org . Boca Woods Country Club - bocaratonobserver.com Skip to main content Search Subscribe facebook instagram RSS Culture Buzz Destinations Features Style Wellness Food & Drink Bites Cheers Chef Profile Readers’ Choice Restaurant Guide Restaurant News Review Community Around Town Community News Flash Giving Back La Vida Boca Happenings Calendar Editor's Corner Out 'N' About Guides Charity Country Clubs Education Top Docs Top Lawyers Visitors Profiles Country Club Collection Cuisine Scene Health Care Heroes Inspired Home Men On The Move Power Players Professional Edge Top Docs Top Lawyers Wonder Women Fresh Picks Home Boca Woods Country Club Boca Woods Country Club 10471 Boca Woods Lane , Boca Raton , Florida 33428 Print Video Photos Map × 1 of 7 × 2 of 7 × 3 of 7 × 4 of 7 × 5 of 7 × 6 of 7 × 7 of 7 Prev Next Nearby Nearby Events Address 10471 Boca Woods Lane , Boca Raton , Florida 33428 Phone 561-487-2800 Visit Website A Private Boca Raton Country Club Boca Woods Country Club welcomes members to an upscale and active lifestyle set in a relaxed and comfortable country club setting. It's a family friendly community where neighbors become friends and friends become family.  Members embrace a complete lifestyle with an array of resort-style amenities including 36-holes of spectacular golf, 8 Har Tru tennis courts, modern Fitness Center, card rooms and an elegant-contemporary clubhouse for dining and socializing. Lifelong friendships are made while enjoying a life well lived. In an effort to expand and upgrade the services and amenities available to our members, Boca Woods Country Club has developed a comprehensive Facilities Enhancement Plan. The heart of the Plan is a new building, which will be located on the site of the existing cart barn building. This building will feature: A new state of the art Fitness Center comprised of exercise studios, gym, spin room, laundry, lounges and multi-purpose areas. A Spa with treatment rooms for massage and space for a physical therapy area, a salon, lounges, steam rooms and saunas. New men's and women's locker and bath facilities with lounges, shoe cleaning services and showers. New golf and tennis operations center with pro shops, fitting rooms and staff offices. Cart barn with golf cart staging and club cleaning areas. Administrative offices and reception area In addition, our redesigned clubhouse will allow for a new entry lobby, bathrooms, expanded and properly designed administrative offices, and much needed conference, meeting and multi-use space. The décor throughout the new and renovated areas will contain modern finishes and details and abundant natural light. In addition, tailored functional and aesthetic finishes are planned for each of the individual areas as appropriate. Amenities And Services: Golf: The Lakes Course was designed by Karl Litten who apprenticed to one of the greatest golf course architects, Robert von Hagge. Recently redesigned by Kipp Schulties, the Lakes Course tests the golfer's skill as it brings water into play on 15 of its 18 holes. It is a beautifully landscaped course with a number of doglegs allowing for high risk/reward shot making. The newly renovated Woods Course was the first of the two courses built at Boca Woods Country Club. It was designed by golf course architect, Joe Lee, who has designed over 200 world-class championship golf courses including the famous Blue Monster at the Doral Resort in Miami, Florida.  The course is characterized by gentle doglegs, elevated, fast sloping greens and the strategic placement of numerous bunkers throughout its 18 broad fairways maintained in excellent condition. Tennis: 7 Har-Tru Courts with 4 lit for evening play, 2 Pickleball Courts Fitness Center: Members enjoy the convenience of a workout in the Club’s fitness facility replete with state-of-the-art equipment, a weight room and cardio studio. Our experienced staff managed by our Certified Training Director will help you achieve your fitness goals. Take advantage of expert professional instruction, personal training and massage therapy. Weekly group fitness classes are complimentary.  Get fit with Pilates, yoga, Boot Camp, Zumba or Water Aerobics classes.  With a variety of exercise options utilizing the latest equipment and an outdoor heated swimming pool, it’s easy to live well and maintain a healthy lifestyle at Boca Woods. Dining: Our innovative culinary team brings passion and acclaimed experience to Boca Woods Country Club. The results are a 5-star dining experience in the sophisticated ambiance of a private club. Enjoy the warm and friendly attitude of our professional, well-trained staff. Boca Woods is a club where members are greeted by name and appreciate an exceptional level of service in a relaxed dining atmosphere. The entire staff is dedicated to providing an outstanding experience for you and your guests. The Dining Room and Sunset Terrace: Savor dinner and enjoy a show in our Club Dining Room, or unwind on the Sunset Terrace, with panoramic golf vistas. The Bar: Enjoy craft cocktails and happy hour offered daily. Try Boca Woods house-made, barrel aged whiskey in your next Old Fashioned or Manhattan. Membership Information: To learn more about Boca Woods Country Club, please contact our Director of Membership & Marketing, Adria Worthington, at membership@bocawoodscc.com or 561-487-2800 ext. 147. Meet the Team | Boca Woods Country Club Experts About the Club Membership Request Information Meet the Team Philanthropy Lifestyle Community Overview Social & Clubs Real Estate Events & Videos Club Tour Golf The Lakes Course The Woods Course Meet our Golf Pros Racquet Sports Tennis Pickleball Bocce Meet our Racquet Sports Team Wellness Fitness Spa Services Meet our Wellness Team Dining Overview Meet our F&B Team Contact Us Get in Touch Directions Careers image Menu About the Club Membership Request Information Meet the Team Philanthropy Lifestyle Community Overview Social & Clubs Real Estate Events & Videos Club Tour Golf The Lakes Course The Woods Course Meet our Golf Pros Racquet Sports Tennis Pickleball Bocce Meet our Racquet Sports Team Wellness Fitness Spa Services Meet our Wellness Team Dining Overview Meet our F&B Team Contact Us Get in Touch Directions Careers image Member Login Meet our F&B Team CULINARY STAFF Jeffrey Terentieff Executive Chef 561.487.2800 ext: 126 Originally born and raised in Connecticut, Chef Jeff Terentieff hails from a family deeply rooted in the food and beverage industry. After a decorated service in the U.S. Army, he attended The Culinary Institute of America. Relocating to Boca Raton in 1999, Jeff continued to carve his path in upscale restaurants. In 2006, he made the leap into the world of country clubs starting at Boca West Country Club, and quickly working his way up to the role of Executive Sous Chef. After 10 years he was offered his first Executive chef position at Gleneagles Golf & Country Club in Delray Beach and then at Aberdeen Golf & Country Club in Boynton Beach. Most recently, Jeff returned to Boca West, overseeing a substantial $13 million annual F&B operation, and playing a pivotal role in the $70 million clubhouse renovation. Jeff currently resides in East Boca with his 3 young children. He loves to cook at home as well as engulf himself in all things related. Jeff is an avid golfer, active church member, gym fanatic, and lover of all things outdoors. Rowan Newman Executive Sous Chef 561.487.2800 ext: 127 Rowan Newman joined Boca Woods in 2021. He has almost 20 years of experience working in Palm Beach County Country Clubs. He started his career at Boca West Country Club as an international employee from Capetown, South Africa. This is where he worked his way into a management training program that allowed him to stay on staff year-round. He remained at Boca West for nearly ten years, where he gained the knowledge to work every outlet of the seven fullservice restaurants on site, his favorite being the fine dining steak house. When given the opportunity to further his career, Rowan moved to Hunters Run Country Club in Boynton Beach in 2013. This is where he began broadening his knowledge of food, menu writing, and teamwork as a Sous Chef. He remained at Hunters Run until now, and he is excited to be a part of such a talented management team that is so passionate about their crafts. He looks forward to adding his expertise to the group. Rowan is a Boca Raton resident where he lives with his wife and children. Devlin Page Director of Dining Operations [email protected] (561) 487-2800 ext.143 Devlin Wilkie-Page is an experienced Senior Food and Beverage Manager with nearly a decade in the hospitality industry. His career began in the United States under the H2B visa program at Gleneagles Country Club, laying a strong foundation for his growth in the field. Over the years, Devlin has gained valuable experience across prestigious clubs, including Ridgewood Country Club, the River Club, and the Atlanta Athletic Club, managing diverse dining and event operations. Serving as Senior Food and Beverage Manager at the Atlanta Athletic Club in Georgia, Devlin oversees menu development, staff recruitment, inventory management, and member relations, with a focus on financial efficiency and quality service. His expertise in banquet and event management, relationship-building, and strategic operations is complemented by his active involvement in the Georgia Chapter of the Club Management Association of America. Devlin is excited to bring his experience and dedication to Boca Woods as he joins the team, eager to deliver high-quality dining experiences and build meaningful relationships with Members. Jordan Findlay Food& Beverage Operations Manager [email protected] (561) 487-2800 ext.135 Jordan Findlay, hailing from South Africa, embarked on his American journey on a H2B visa. His rise in the hospitality industry is marked by his tenure at various esteemed country clubs on the East Coast of the USA. Starting as a server assistant in 2016, Jordan's dedication and passion led him to ascend in the industry through the roles of Server, Captain, Food and Beverage Supervisor which all built is foundation to his current role as Operations Manager, where he now oversees complex operations and ensures excellence in service. With a keen focus on fine dining experiences, Jordan grew his expertise with renowned establishments such as Boca West Country Club, Ibis Country Club, Baltusrol Golf Club, and more. His journey reflects a commitment to creating unforgettable events, delivering exceptional service, and orchestrating lively parties. Jordan's passion for learning and advancing his education is a driving force in his career. Committed to personal and professional growth, he continues to seek opportunities to expand his knowledge and skills in the dynamic field of hospitality. His continuous expansion of his education sets the stage for a promising and evolving career in the industry. Want to contact our Dining Team? Features of Boca Woods Homes Constructed from 2001 to 2003, Boca Woods consists of 650 beautiful, single-family homes offering a variety of designs and floor plans from which to choose . These elegant one- and two-story homes range in size from 1,500 to over 3,000 square feet of luxurious living space and are complete with many desirable features. Some of the features available in homes for sale in Boca Woods Country Club include: Upgraded tile and hardwood flooring Designer kitchens with stainless steel appliances Granite countertops in the kitchens and baths Private swimming pools Beautiful outdoor living spaces Two- to three-car garages All homes in Boca Woods offer gorgeous views of rolling green fairways, tranquil lakes, and the surrounding nature preserve . With a wide variety of unique-styled homes, Boca Woods offers something for every type of home buyer. Amenities At Boca Woods Boca Woods provides members with the ultimate country club lifestyle, complete with a host of world-class amenities that can be enjoyed year-round. For the tennis enthusiasts, Boca Woods features eight Har-Tru tennis courts , four of which are lighted for evening play, as well as free weekly clinics. There are also group and private lessons available, which are conducted by USPTA certified tennis professionals. Boca Woods also has two 18-hole championship golf courses both of which are unique but equally challenging for golfers of every level. The Lakes Course was designed by famed golf course architect Karl Litten, and The Woods Course was designed by legendary architect Joe Lee. Naturally, Boca Woods provides expert golf instruction and free weekly clinics with the P.G.A professional staff, as well as year-round tournaments. Boca Woods also has an expansive driving range, a newly re-designed chipping area, and a practice sand bunker for golfers who want to work on improving their game. Boca Woods has a newly-expanded, state-of-the-art Fitness Center complete with top-of-the-line cardio and weight training equipment, as well as his and her locker rooms. The fitness center offers a variety of classes such as aerobics, Pilates, Zumba, and Yoga, as well as private personal training and professional massage therapy. The beautiful clubhouse at Boca Woods offers a variety of dining options sure to impress even those with the most discerning of palates. From quick and casual to formal dining options to formal, the executive chef takes great pride in the menu, always offering new and innovative cuisine in addition to traditional favorites. Boca Woods also offers an award-winning wine program recognized with an Award of Merit by the CMAA International Wine Society, making it one of the 50 clubs nationwide to receive this recognition. Regarding activities and fun, these are endless at Boca Woods , with a host of social events and activities scheduled throughout the year. From weekly organized games and card competitions in the men's and women's card rooms to formal galas and evening events, Boca Woods provides a diverse social calendar that keeps members engaged and encourage friendship and socialization within the community. Boca Woods Location Boca Woods located in a convenient West Boca Raton location, between Glades and Palmetto Park Road, just west of Lyons Road. The community is situated mere minutes from some of the best that South Florida has to offer, such as: Pristine Beaches Natural Parks Fine Restaurants Mizner Park Boca Raton Resort & Club Gumbo Limbo Nature Center Boca Town Center Mall Boca Raton Museum of Art iPic movie theaters I95 and Florida's Turnpike Some of the best schools in the area Overall, living in Boca Woods provides you with a luxurious lifestyle, a warm, peaceful atmosphere, and the ideal location that anyone would desire in country club living. If would like to learn more about Boca Woods homes for sale or would like additional information about any of the other Boca Raton country club communities , please call us at 561-998-9015 . You may also contact us by completing the brief form provided below and one of our Boca Raton real estate experts will reach out to assist you promptly.
